name: The Fathomer's Chasuble
data: It decreases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It increases the users wisdom a bit.
It increases the users intelligence a bit.
It has decent armour class for its type (mediocre in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration superbly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It boosts the wearer's regeneration in combat.
